005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008public interface IFieldInstanceGrouped extends INamedModelInstanceGrouped, IFieldInstance {
009
010  /**
011   * Determines if the field is configured to have a wrapper in XML.
012   *
013   * @return {@code true} if an XML wrapper is required, or {@code false}
014   *         otherwise
015   */
016  @Override
017  default boolean isInXmlWrapped() {
018    // must always be wrapped
019    return true;
020  }
021
022  @Override
023  default boolean isEffectiveValueWrappedInXml() {
024    // must always be wrapped
025    return true;
026  }
027}
